name: Crypt Walker
description:
Thrown into the crypts, you must find a way out of to achieve your freedom. It's dark and cold and you don't know what lurks beyond the initial chamber. Defenceless and vulnerable you won't be able to fight your way through this one, instead stealth and subterfuge will be your sword and shield.

DD38 specifics:

Demo is 3 levels long.

Windows version is tested from start to finish. MAC-OS & Linux not tested.

Controls

WASD - Movement

1 - Equip Stone

3 - Equip Key

4 - Equip Bucket

T - Equip Torch (left hand)

Left Click - Use currently (right hand) equipped item

Hold Esc - Main Menu
